entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
